Stapler with built-in scanner: This idea involves creating a stapler with a built-in scanner that scans the documents being stapled and saves them electronically. This would be a great tool for people who need to keep track of important documents and prefer a physical copy.

Stapler with a touch screen: This idea involves creating a stapler with a touch screen to display important information such as the date, time, and number of pages being stapled. This would be a great tool for people who need to keep track of important documents and prefer a digital interface.

Stapler with a USB port: This idea involves creating a stapler with a USB port that allows users to transfer files to and from the stapler. This would be a great tool for people who need to transfer files between devices quickly and easily.

Stapler with a built-in printer: This idea involves creating a stapler with a built-in printer that prints the documents being stapled. This would be a great tool for people who need to print out important documents and prefer a physical copy.

Stapler with a smartphone app: This idea involves creating a stapler with a smartphone app that allows users to control the stapler remotely. This would be a great tool for people who need to staple documents from a distance or need to keep track of important documents on their phone.
